【考法 1】 n. 克制；忍耐： tolerance and restraint in the face of provocation; patience
【例】 reach the end of my forbearance 到了让我忍无可忍的地步
【近】 patience, temperance, tolerance, toleration
【反】 impatience 不耐烦
【考法 2】 n. 友好仁慈的态度： kind, gentle, or compassionate treatment especially towards someone who is undeserving of it
【例】 The judge showed forbearance, and gave the teenaged first offender罪犯 a suspended sentence.
【近】 charity, clemency, leniency, mercifulness, quarter
【反】 vindictiveness 恶意
【记】 forbear名词
